thread.title: Married At First Sight 2017: Are Andrew and Cheryl paired together?
thread.title_full: Married At First Sight 2017: Are Andrew and Cheryl paired together?

author: news.com.au
title: Married At First Sight 2017: Are Andrew and Cheryl paired together?
text:
JILTED groom Andrew is set to return to Married At First Sight on Monday night, but is he marrying broken-hearted Cheryl? 
It’s hard to believe it’s been one whole week since Andrew was ditched out the front of a pub by his wife Lauren just hours after their wedding. And given his new single status, a teaser for Monday night’s episode shows him returning to the series.
Andrew makes a return to Married At First Sight in a teaser. Source: Channel 9 
While it’s entirely possible he could be matched with a brand new wife, the teaser also shows Cheryl sitting down with the show’s psychologist John Aiken to drop a “bombshell” — with Aiken labelling her request a “ Married At First Sight first”.
Cheryl drops her “bombshell” to psychologist John Aiken. Source: Channel 9 
Cheryl decided to leave the show on Sunday night, ending her marriage to husband Jonathan after she caught the entrepreneur texting fellow contestant Scarlett behind her back.
So what brings her back to the series?
Not only is her return to the show on the same night as Andrew’s quite convenient, but their pairing would make complete sense after they got flirty with each other at last week’s group dinner party .
During the party, viewers witnessed Cheryl’s marriage to Jonathan imploding as they ignored each other and Jonathan flirted with his future text-buddy Scarlett.
But instead of sitting back and feeling sorry for herself, Cheryl began flirting with jilted groom Andrew.
Cheryl and Andrew flirt throughout last week’s dinner party. Source: Channel 9 
It got so hot and heavy between them, Cheryl actually salted his food you guys.
And that’s not a euphemism — she actually took it upon herself to grab the salt and pepper shakers and go to town on his meal.
They then joint-rapped a Salt-N-Pepa song off-key and out of rhythm.
Viewers were quick to predict the future couple. And it could all become official on Monday.
Plot twist! Cheryl and Andrew! #MarriedAtFirstSight #9Married 
— sam popprox (@popprox) February 8, 2017 #9married Cheryl can't leave, she's got the hots for Andrew
— Ivanka ☉ (@IvankaVic16) February 8, 2017 Cheryl, drop that zero and get yoself a hero (i.e., Andrew the fireman) #9married 
— Kyla Smith (@killamanilla87) February 8, 2017 Yes Andrew you are a better match for Cheryl than Jonathan!!!! #9Married 
— Kristen Jones (@MissKris_89) February 9, 2017
